artist: Painter: After Philippe Jacques de Loutherbourg II; Etcher: John Landseer; Publisher: Cadell and Davies
description: Tailpiece from chapter 16 of first book of Macabees in Maclin's Bible; sword and dramatic mask below a ledge with fruit bowl and two bottles; grapes growing along ledge
inscription:
Signature, Date and Inscription

in image in black: J Landseer fecit  Published Sep. 4, 1815 T.Cadell and W. Davies, London  | on sheet in pencil:  2-701
